capService.enterCapPathChoiceName: Manually select CAP service folder path

ignoreCertErrors.message: Do you want to continue generation with the untrusted certificate?

validationMessages.odataVersionMismatch: The template you have chosen supports V{{requiredOdataVersion}} OData services only. The provided version is V{{providedOdataVersion}}.
validationMessages.metadataFilePathNotValid: Metadata file does not exist or is not accessible. Please specify a valid file path.
validationMessages.capProjectNotFound: The folder you have selected does not seem to contain a valid CAP project. Please check and try again.
validationMessages.annotationsNotFound: Annotations not found for specified service

warnings.nonUIServiceTypeWarningMessage: Please note that {{serviceType}} services, or not classified services, are not intended to be used for the generation of SAP Fiori UI applications
warnings.noServicesAvailable: No services available for the selected system, see logs for further details.
warnings.noServicesAvailableForOdataVersion: There are no V{{odataVersion}} OData services available from the selected system and the template you have chosen supports V{{odataVersion}} OData services only
warnings.noAnnotations: No backend annotations associated with this service were retrieved and may result in an invalid application being created

systemUrl.description: Enter the URL of the SAP System

systemService.noServicesWarning: No services available for the selected system, see logs for further details.

newSystemType.choiceAbapOnBtp: ABAP Environment on SAP Business Technology Platform
newSystemType.choiceCFAbapEnvServiceOnBtp: Cloud Foundry ABAP environment on SAP Business Technology Platform
newSystemType.notYetImplementedWarningMessage: The selected system type: {{ systemType }} is not yet implemented.

systemName.hint: Entering a system name will save the connection for re-use.
systemName.systemNameExistsWarning: A system with that name already exists in the secure storage. Please try a different name.
systemName.reservedSystemNameWarning: '{{ systemName }}' is a reserved system name. Please try a different name.

systemSelection.authenticationFailedUpdateCredentials: Authentication failed. Please try updating the credentials.

serviceKey.hint: Select a local file that defines the service connection for an ABAP Environment on SAP Business Technology Platform.
serviceKey.incompleteServiceKeyInfo: Service keys file does not contain the required information
serviceKey.unparseableServiceKey: Service keys file contents are not a valid JSON format

cloudFoundryAbapSystem.hint: Enter the name of the Cloud Foundry service that contains the ABAP Environment instance.

destinationServicePath.hint: Enter the path to the OData service, relative to the selected destination URL.
destinationServicePath.invalidServicePathWarning: Please enter a valid service path

mainEntitySelection.defaultEntityNameNotFoundWarning: The supplied entity cannot be found in the service. Please choose from the list above.
mainEntitySelection.noDraftEnabledEntitiesError: The CAP service you have chosen does not have any entities that are draft enabled. In order to generate a V4 Fiori application using this floor plan for a CAP project, the entity selected must be draft enabled.
mainEntitySelection.noEntitiesAlpV4Error: The OData V4 service you have provided is not suitable for use in an Analytical List Page application. The service must contain aggregate based entity sets for this template.

tableType.hint: Defines the table type for the List Report Page.

hierarchyQualifier.hint: Leading property that decides between either a recursive hierarchy or data aggregation.
hierarchyQualifier.qualifierRequiredForV4Warning: Hierarchy qualifier is required for V4 OData services

addFEOPAnnotations.message: Automatically add a form to the generated application if none already exists?

addLineItemAnnotations.message: Automatically add table columns to the list page and a section to the object page if none already exists?
addLineItemAnnotations.valueHelpsAnnotationsInfoMessage: Basic value helps will also be created.

presentationQualifier.hint: Represents the qualifier of the SelectionPresentationVariant. Analytical List Page looks for SelectionPresentationVariant with this qualifier and if not found, it looks for PresentationVariant with this qualifier.

tableSelectionMode.hint: Defines different selection modes for the SmartTable in Analytical List Page.

tableMultiSelect.hint: Allows you to show a checkbox for selecting multiple items in a table. This setting comes into effect only if there are actions defined either through annotation or manifest.

tableAutoHide.hint: Determines chart/table interaction. If set to true, the chart acts as a filter for the table. If set to false, the matching table rows are highlighted but the table is not filtered.

destination.authError: The selected system is returning an authentication error. System name: {{systemName}}, error: {{- error}}

errors.cannotReadCapServiceMetadata: An error occurred reading CAP service metadata: {{serviceName}}. $t(texts.seeLogForDetails)
errors.capModelAndServicesLoadError: An error occurred loading the CAP model and services{{- error, addMsgWithColonFormatter}}
errors.capServiceUrlPathNotDefined: An error occurred reading CAP service metadata: {{serviceName}}. CAP service property `urlPath` is not defined but is required.
errors.connectionError: A connection error occurred, please ensure the target host is available on the network: {{- error}}
errors.noServicesAvailable: There are no V{{version}} OData services available from the selected system and the template you have chosen supports V{{version}} OData services only
errors.systemOrServiceUrlNotFound: Please verify the url: {{- url}}, target system configuration and network connectivity
errors.certValidationRequired: Certificate validation is required to continue.
errors.serviceMetadataError: An error occurred reading service metadata for service: {{- servicePath}}
errors.abapServiceAuthenticationFailed: ABAP environment authentication using UAA failed.
errors.serviceCatalogRequest: An error occurred requesting services from: {{- catalogRequestUri }} and entity set: {{entitySet}}. {{error}}
errors.storedSystemConnectionError: An error occurred while validating the stored system connection info. System name: {{-systemName}}, error: {{- error}}
errors.noCatalogOrServiceAvailable: No active system or OData service endpoint connection available to retrieve service(s).
errors.allCatalogServiceRequestsFailed: All catalog service requests failed for the selected system. OData version(s): V{{version}}.
errors.unparseableMetadata: Unable to parse entities from metadata document. {{-error}}
errors.unparseableOdataVersion: Unable to parse the odata version from the metadata.
errors.noRelevantEntities: The template and service selected have no relevant entities that you can use.

warnings.largeMetadataDocument: The metadata for this OData service is significantly large. It may take some time before this operation completes.

texts.checkDestinationAuthConfig: Please check the SAP BTP destination authentication configuration.
